law.catch_line: Treasurer to receive and acknowledge notification of moneys from state agencies.
law.text: The Treasurer shall receive notification from state agencies of all money due or payable to the state. The Treasurer shall provide acknowledgment of the notification to the Finance and Administration Cabinet.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(1). -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4695.
